greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of multiset partitions of a multiset whose multiplicities are the prime indices of n.
link: Andrew Howroyd, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..700
program: sig(n)={my(f=factor(n)); concat(vector(#f~, i, vector(f[i,2], j, primepi(f[i,1]))))}
count(sig)={my(n=vecsum(sig), A=O(x*x^vecmax(sig)), s=0); forpart(p=n, my(q=1/prod(i=1, #p, 1 - x^p[i] + A)); s+=prod(i=1, #sig, polcoef(q,sig[i]))*permcount(p)); s/n!}
a(n)={if(n==1, 1, my(s=sig(n)); if(#s==1, numbpart(s[1]), count(sig(n))))} \\ _Andrew Howroyd_, Dec 10 2018
results.author: _Gus Wiseman_, Aug 23 2018
